title: Limited trophic levels with 5 answer options

content.prompt: Which of the following best explains why there are seldom more than five trophic levels in a food chain?

choices.label: Most carnivores function at more than one trophic level.
Trophic levels above this number contain too many individuals.
Top carnivores are too few in number to prey effectively.
Energy is lost from each trophic level.
